full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I RDZOGS RIM RNAL 'BYOR BZHI RIM GYI RNAM BSHAD BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @203B CES PA 'DI NI RIGS RUS PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING BSTAN PA DANG BSTAN 'DZIN LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR RJE RIN PO CHE'I BSTAN PA LA THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I DAD PA THOB @204A *, ,PA ZHABS DRUNG TSE RING DBANG RGYAL KYI BKAS BSKUL BA LTAR, CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN PA DON YOD MKHAS GRUB KYIS GUR SMON DBEN GNAS SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI 'PHRIN LAS RNAM RGYAL DANG, ,SKAL BZANG CHOS LDAN GNYIS KYIS PA'O,, ,,SIDDHI RASTU, ,
